players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: " I am innocent and saw Bob with Charlie last night. "
You: " I'm concerned about Charlie's alibi and want to know more about it. "
You: " I want to ask Charlie more about his alibi and what he was doing with Bob last night. "
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Charlie was with me, so he has a solid alibi."
